sourcesContent:
import { Box, Heading, Text, Button, Image, Flex } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const Hero = () => (
  <Box bg="blackAlpha.800" py="20" px="10">
    <Flex
      direction={{ base: 'column', md: 'row' }}
      align="center"
      justify="space-between"
      maxW="1200px"
      mx="auto"
      wrap="wrap"
    >
      {/* Text Section */}
      <Box textAlign={{ base: 'center', md: 'left' }} maxW="600px" mb={{ base: '6', md: '0' }}>
        <Heading as="h1" size="2xl" mb="4">
          Hi, I'm Kenneth
        </Heading>
        <Text fontSize="lg" color="gray.400" mb="6">
          A Passionate Web Developer with a knack for creating user-friendly and responsive digital experiences.
        </Text>
        <Button colorScheme="orange" size="lg">
          View My Work
        </Button>
      </Box>
      
      {/* Image Section */}
      <Image
        src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4D03AQFRAH75-VkPnQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1706690757481?e=1731542400&v=beta&t=bSemv97BJoToUvePnG7uxFXxYix5rMdOCs4cBbk5Op4"  
        alt="Kenneth's profile"
        borderRadius="lg"
        boxSize={{ base: '200px', md: '400px' }}
        objectFit="cover"
        mt={{ base: '6', md: '0' }}
      />
    </Flex>
  </Box>
);

export default Hero;
